meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Hope Elspeth Green Deborah Beams Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7510.

td.p: Jim Hope, a writer and producer from Tustin, California
Elspeth Green, a graduate student from Princeton, New Jersey
Deborah Beams, a certified public accountant from Dallas, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,000)

tr.td: FENCING
IN THE NEWS
2-LETTER WORDS
SHALLOW THOUGHTS
MOUNTAINS
ROYAL OPERA HOUSE TITLES
(Alex: Options from the drop-down menu on London's Royal Opera House website.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'One of the 3 weapons used in fencing, it\'s also a verb meaning "to hinder"')

tr.td: One of the 3 weapons used in fencing, it's also a verb meaning "to hinder"

Elspeth
Jim
FENCING
HISTORY AT SEA
WHAT '80s MOVIE IS THAT SONG FROM?

LITERARY CHICAGO

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew shows an animation of the Lusitania on the monitor.) Torpedoed on May 7, 1915, the Lusitania sank in just 18 minutes, in part because these watertight internal divisions ran longitudinally, confining incoming water to one side and causing a huge list to starboard

tr.td: Deborah

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: There\'s a trap here, and you had to be very, very careful.)
...
(Alex: [To Deborah] Because you think of the land of milk and honey.)
...
(Alex: [To Elspeth] What were you going for?)
(Elspeth: UAE.)
...
(Alex: [To Jim] The correct response, by the way, is the land of cheese, milk chocolate, and banking.)
DeborahWhat is Israel?
$3,100
ElspethWhat is UAL?
$11,201
JimWhat is Israel?
$11,201
Switzerland')

tr.td: COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD
A 2010 study of this country is subtitled "Inside the Land of Milk and Money"
Deborah
Elspeth
Jim
2-day champion: $23,300
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Deborah
Elspeth
Jim

(including 1 DD),
